titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 8/4/1995--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from August 4 until September 6, 1995, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from any day between August 5 and August 19 until September 5, 1995.
